entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as looking white and having both eyes fixed unblinkingly upon Harry's face. He is also referred to as 'himself' indicating that he is a person.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who looked white, implying that he is a person.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is referred to multiple times in the passage. He is described as having his head feel clearer and being able to see Moody's face distinctly.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as 'the Dark Lord' and is referred to as someone who has returned.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as someone from whom Voldemort took stuff, implying that he is a person.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone to whom Harry should have told something, implying that he is a person.

relationships.description: Moody asks Harry questions about Voldemort's return and the Death Eaters.
Voldemort took stuff from Wormtail, implying a relationship of taking something from someone.
Voldemort also took stuff from Harry, implying another relationship of taking something from someone.
